text: On anre nihte ealdne monan far þu to cinge, bidde þæs þu wille, he þe þæt gifð, gang in to him on þa þriddan tide þæs dæges oððe þænne þu wene, þæt sæ sy full.
On twanihtne monan far to & bige land, þæt þine yldran ahton, þonne miht þu hit alysan.
OnIIInihtne monan far þonne on þin land & þu his wel gewealtst, & sec þine frynd & hi þe beoð bliþe.
